input: Huseyin Butuner and Hilmi Guner designed the Baku Turkish Martyrs memorial in red granite and white marble. It is dedicated to the soldiers of the Ottoman army who died in the battle of Baku.

Task: From the text, 1) list detected mentions with tentative types, 2) propose up to k=6 candidate triples [subject, relation, object]. Use only relations whose domain/range match the types you inferred. For each triple, include confidence ∈ [0,1] and cite the exact supporting span(s).

    Text
    "Huseyin Butuner and Hilmi Guner designed the Baku Turkish Martyrs memorial in red granite and white marble. It is dedicated to the soldiers of the Ottoman army who died in the battle of Baku."

    Ontology concepts
    Monument, Place, City, Country, Person, Religion, Material, Municipality, Currency, EthnicGroup, State, Language, Category, Organisation

    Ontology relations (domain → range)
    - hasToItsSoutheast(Monument,Place)
- hasToItsWest(Monument,Place)
- established(Monument,Date)
- capital(Country,City)
- designer(Monument,Person)
- hasToItsNorth(Monument,Place)
- hasToItsSouthwest(Monument,Place)
- religion(Monument,Religion)
- material(Monument,Material)
- location(Monument,Place)
- municipality(Monument,Municipality)
- currency(Country,Currency)
- leaderTitle(Country,string)
- dedicatedTo(Monument,Person)
- ethnicGroup(Country,EthnicGroup)
- leader(Country,Person)
- district(Country,Place)
- inaugurationDate(Monument,Date)
- country(Monument,Country)
- largestCity(Country,City)
- state(Monument,State)
- language(Country,Language)
- category(Monument,Category)
- nativeName(Monument,string)
- nearestCity(Monument,City)
- owningOrganisation(Monument,Organisation)

    Output format (JSON only)
    {
      "mentions": [
        {"surface": "...", "type_candidates": ["ConceptA","ConceptB"], "span": [start,end]}
      ],
      "triples": [
        {
          "triple": ["subject","relation","object"],
          "confidence": 0.0,
          "support": "exact quote from text",
          "notes": "why domain/range fits"
        }
      ]
    }

    Constraints
    Only output domain/range-valid triples.
    Normalize dates to YYYY-MM-DD when possible.
    If a pronoun is required, resolve it to the nearest valid antecedent and state that in notes.
    Do not invent entities not in the text.
